findings.message:
MonstaPresale.adoptMonsta() (MonstaPresale.sol#146-161) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(now <= PRESALE_END_TIMESTAMP) (MonstaPresale.sol#147)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
Reentrancy in MonstaPresale.adoptMonsta() (MonstaPresale.sol#146-161):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(value) (MonstaPresale.sol#154)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _adopters[msg.sender] = true (MonstaPresale.sol#156)
	- _currentPrice = _currentPrice.add(PRICE_INCREMENT) (MonstaPresale.sol#158)
	- _totalAdoptedMonstas = _totalAdoptedMonstas.add(1) (MonstaPresale.sol#157)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- MonstaAdopted(msg.sender) (MonstaPresale.sol#160)
findings.name: reentrancy-unlimited-gas
